member.summary: Called when the user presses the 'Save and Close' button to apply the changes to the appointment.

member.returns: true, if there were actual changes to the appointment; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.AppointmentForm.ApplyRecurrenceChanges(MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment)
member.summary: Called when the user presses the 'Save and Close' button to apply the changes to the appointment's recurrence.
member.param: The appointment to which to apply the recurrence.
member.returns: true, if there were actual changes to the recurrence; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.AppointmentForm.SetDates(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the dates to be used to initialize the form if no appointment is initially set.
member.param: A DateTime instance specifying the initial start date of the new appointment.
A DateTime instance specifying the initial end date of the new appointment.
A Boolean flag indicating whether the appointment is an all-day event initially.
member.remarks: After you create a new instance of the AppointmentForm class, either call SetAppointment to select existing appointment for editing, or optionally call SetDates to initialize some fields on the form.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.AppointmentForm.SetAppointment(MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment)
member.summary: Sets the appointment that is to be edited in the form.
member.param: A reference to the Appointment object to be selected in the form for editing.
member.remarks: If the appointment represents a recurrence instance or exception, only the instance is being edited. If it represents a recurrence master, all instances are edited.
